response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a price tailored to reflect its true value to you. I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This offer not only ensures you secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price but also allows us to establish a valuable partnership. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss this further.", "product_price": 950000}
